challenge.name: #FFA020Autumn Forests

challenge.name: #50FF50Jungle Trip
challenge.descr: A trip inside jungle, not too dense. On 2 long, scenic tracks.

challenge.name: #C0F080Savanna Frenzy
challenge.descr: A trip to savanna, and it's frenzy roads.

challenge.name: #F0F000Desert Visit
challenge.descr: Visit to desert, on sand dunes.

challenge.name: #FFF050Persian #FFC070Fun
challenge.descr: Drive in narrow Persian cities.

challenge.name: #D0D8D8Winter Sleep
challenge.descr: Winter rally, slippery snow tracks.

challenge.name: #A0C080Forest Lanscapes
challenge.descr: A trip on good looking forest tracks.

challenge.name: #B0FF00Greece Coast
challenge.descr: Possibly bumpy, narrow or long tracks with good coastal views.

challenge.name: #70F0B0Mossy Jungle
challenge.descr: Banked and mossy jungle tracks.

challenge.name: #E0B090Canyon Side
challenge.descr: Highest banked (terrain tilt angles) tracks.

challenge.descr: A longer collection of tracks, when it is constantly raining, not too little and not too much. Mostly forest tracks with clouded sky. Rather short and easy to drive, but surely slippery. #C0E0C0Fast vehicles available, changing possible.

challenge.name: #000000Black and #D0D8D8white #A0A5A9melancholy
challenge.descr: Series of tracks with almost no color. Odd tracks on white winter, even tracks black or dark. High contrast. Surely the least appealing and depressing sceneries.

challenge.name: #908030Brown #E0D850yellow pie
challenge.descr: Another alternating series, where odd tracks are brown (some dark), and even tracks are yellow, mostly desert like.

challenge.name: #80FF80The Long Beauty
challenge.descr: Very long and beautiful terrain tracks.

challenge.name: #B0FF00Bumpy Rally
challenge.descr: Short, fast tracks, positively banked.

challenge.name: #E0B090Medium endurance
challenge.descr: Long tracks. Need some endurance skills, clean driving with no mistakes.

challenge.name: #F0A080Long endurance
challenge.descr: Very long tracks, need strong endurance skills and no mistakes while driving fast.

challenge.name: #A0A000Bumpy rocks
challenge.descr: Short but very bumpy tracks. Drive cautiously, slower to not jump on bumps.

challenge.name: #A0C080Mad Hills
challenge.descr: Medium tracks on quite noisy, random hills.

challenge.name: #70E050Swamps
challenge.descr: The original Swamp and MudBath tracks. Quite bumpy and a bit tricky. Need to know the route to drive them fast.

challenge.name: #A0C080Tricky Heights
challenge.descr: Medium tracks placed very high in mountains. Also curly and tricky.

challenge.name: #D0D8D8Winter Chill
challenge.descr: Icy winter tracks with solid ice surfaces, snowy road, wet asphalt, later with snowstorm and very winding, banked parts.

challenge.name: #A0C080Frenzy Maze
challenge.descr: Frenzy (curly) tracks, mostly flat, but with many direction changes. Require a lot of steering.

challenge.name: #E0B080Sway Roads
challenge.descr: Very banked, winding roads. Changing tilt (roll) frequently.

challenge.name: #C0C000Banked Drive
challenge.descr: Smooth but very banked roads.

challenge.name: #E0D0C0Asphalt Cities
challenge.descr: City tracks with mostly asphalt road.

challenge.name: #B0A8A0Fresh rally #A0C080locations
challenge.descr: Few new, rather easy rally tracks in new places, mostly forest.

challenge.name: #40D040Longest #A0D080mountain #C0D0E0trips
challenge.descr: Very long and beautiful mountain tracks with steep hill climbs and including few drives through small villages. Pipes and banked bridges present.

challenge.name: #70F0B0Challenging terrains#B0A030 and pipes
challenge.descr: New tracks with complex terrain and pipe installations.

challenge.name: #C0C000Fast Banked
challenge.descr: Short, very fast, banked forest tracks. Use boost to be faster.

challenge.name: #C0C0A0Ancient Chase
challenge.descr: Fast drive through 2 ancient cities. Sometimes narrow and with sharp turns.

challenge.name: #50FF50Tricky Jungle
challenge.descr: Tricky drive through tiny, narrow, dense jungle tracks. Don't go too fast, it's better to be slower than to hit a tree.

challenge.name: #40C040Fast Jungle
challenge.descr: Fast drive through medium, round jungle tracks.

challenge.name: #A0A000Mud Attack
challenge.descr: Drive through the most mud filled tracks, short and curly. Use boost in mud to be faster.

challenge.name: #F8C0A0Max Banked
challenge.descr: Maximum banked terrain tracks. Very fast and with side turns.

challenge.name: #C0E8A0Twisted Bridges
challenge.descr: Banked and twisted bridged roads. You get fast cars, but the key is to drive not too fast.

challenge.name: #F0F0A0Bridge Blaster
challenge.descr: Race the fastest cars on bridged tracks as fast as you can while avoiding the walls. #E0C080Note: when driving those fast but low suspension cars, you need to brake before all highly banked turns to not damage them.

challenge.name: #FFD040Quickest #F08040long chase
challenge.descr: The extremely fast car fast tracks. Possibly banked or long, but smooth and fun to drive at highest speeds.

challenge.name: #FF6040Madly fast#A0A0FF 6 wheels
challenge.descr: The ultra fast 6x6 vehicle on big fast tracks, some highly banked (tilted). Highest speeds and still possible to boost. Be as fast as possible.

challenge.name: #F0F0F0Icy #A0A0A0bad weather
challenge.descr: Tracks on ice and fog with 4x4 terrain cars.

challenge.name: #D09090Horrible #A0A0A0Weather
challenge.descr: Sandstorms or heavy rain, this is definitely a challenge.

challenge.name: #706030Dark #8080D0Chase
challenge.descr: Short dark tracks with 2 laps.

challenge.name: #908070Dark Habit
challenge.descr: The darkest tracks, slightly depressing but not difficult.

challenge.name: #80A030Unusual Places
challenge.descr: Quite unusual places for racing: on active volcano ground and near volcanic acid. Stay on road to not damage car. Use boost to be faster on straights.

challenge.name: #F080B0Surreal #50F0A0Worlds
challenge.descr: Very unrealistic, yet pretty and sometimes shocking environments.

challenge.name: #80F030Really Dangerous
challenge.descr: The very dangerous tracks. Driving on pipe, or with obstacles. When on pipe, drive slowly and stay on top, go lower only in turns.

challenge.name: #60A030Acid #60F030Lakes #B06050Survival
challenge.descr: Drive 4 laps around Acid Lakes and finish it without taking too much damage from acid. #FFC0C0No time limit. No flip, rewind, boost, or repair.

challenge.name: #F07050Craters #B06050Survival
challenge.descr: Drive 2 laps around Craters, without damaging the car too much from the heat (orange). Stay on road to survive. #FFC0C0No time limit. No flip, rewind, boost, or repair.

challenge.name: #F0C030Lava #806050Pools #B06050Survival
challenge.descr: Drive 3 laps near Lava Pools and finish it in one piece. Need to jump quite well without much damage. #FFC0C0No time limit. No flip, rewind, boost, or repair.

challenge.name: #F080B0Surreal #F040C0Pai#F0F040nt#7070F0ing
challenge.descr: Most surreal and colorful tracks, quite unreal and beautiful.

challenge.name: #C0F080Stunt Fun
challenge.descr: Fun tracks with just a few stunts.

challenge.name: #F0E020Perfect Jumps
challenge.descr: Simple round tracks with jumps. But need to drive perfect. No time for mistakes.

challenge.name: #C0E090Pipe Easy
challenge.descr: Medium difficulty pipe tracks.

challenge.name: #FF9070Stunt Long
challenge.descr: Long stunt filled tracks.

challenge.name: #30F030Half #F0F030Pipes
challenge.descr: Curly tracks with a lot of half pipe roads.

challenge.name: #F0F000Stunt Mix
challenge.descr: Fun filled stunt tracks.

challenge.name: #FF9070Jump Mania
challenge.descr: Very jump filled tracks. Mostly fast, but you need to know jumps well, and know where to land.

challenge.name: #80C0C0Loop Mania
challenge.descr: The most looped tracks, few loops in each, difficult. Pay attention to car damage. Don't drive too fast in loops.

challenge.name: #C0C0FFPipe Master
challenge.descr: Most difficult all-pipe tracks. Long and winding.

challenge.name: #FF5050Stunt Master
challenge.descr: The most difficult, long and twisted stunt tracks. Pay attention to car damage. Avoid hitting walls.

challenge.name: #80FFC0Stunt Madness
challenge.descr: Ultra difficult stunt tracks. Long, extremely curly and twisted. Filled with all stunt elements and obstacles. Caution: be sure you already finished Stunt Master before even trying this one. Knowing these tracks is also key.

challenge.name: #FFA020Exhausting roads
challenge.descr: Very long, winding and exhausting roads with few stunt elements. Twisted bridges first and lots of on pipe driving later.

challenge.name: #B0FF00Fast and mad #A0A0F0pipe rally
challenge.descr: Fastest racing cars on some interesting and still drivable, medium stunt tracks.

challenge.name: #FF9070Red #90A0B0blue stunts
challenge.descr: Alternating series of stunt tracks in red desert and blueish islands.

challenge.name: #F0F060Island #F0D060stunts
challenge.descr: Stunt tracks on various islands. Not too challenging.

challenge.name: #F0F020U#F0D040l#D0B080t#C090A0i#B080C0m#A080D8a#9080E0t#8080F0e #FFA020long #C0C0FFstunts
challenge.descr: Newest long stunt tracks. Great looks and challenging stunts. Last tracks are extremely long. Be prepared, patient and avoid damage, if you want to pass. #C0E0C0Fast vehicles available, changing possible.

challenge.name: #4090F0Crystal Moon #B06050Survival
challenge.descr: Drive 2 laps on the challenging Crystal Moon track. Stay on road, avoid crystals and damage. #FFC0C0No time limit. No flip, rewind, boost, or repair.

challenge.name: #8080D0Exp#A04840edit#A0B0C0ion
challenge.descr: An expedition into other planets, originally driven with electic powered vehicles. Bumpy tracks.

challenge.name: #B0C8E0Space Trip
challenge.descr: Extreme cars in interesting places outside earth.

challenge.name: #F080B0Surreal #80B0FFPlanets
challenge.descr: Rather unrealistic, but great looking outer space environments.

challenge.name: #B0F080Green and #9090E0violet stunts
challenge.descr: Alternating series of tracks on dark violet and lime green alien planets.

challenge.name: #A04840Red #4090F0blue space #9090E0stunts
challenge.descr: Switching between Mars and Crystal Moon stunt tracks.

challenge.name: #8080FFOuter Stunts
challenge.descr: Very fast chase. Great stunts on other planets. Need to use the rechargable boost to be faster.

challenge.name: #D0FFA0Alien #4090F0Stunts #A04840Extreme
challenge.descr: The new outside earth stunt tracks. Continuation of Outer Stunts.

challenge.name: #90D898Easy spacious chase
challenge.descr: Fly spaceships on broad terrain tracks. Be quick and use boost on straights. Caution, don't miss checkpoints by flying too high above them after jump (beams can help).

challenge.name: #E0B090Long flight
challenge.descr: Few very long tracks to fly with spaceships.

challenge.name: #C0C0A0City flight
challenge.descr: Flight through our 2 currently biggest cities. Be fast and don't crash. But also be on time.

challenge.name: #B0B0B0Gray day
challenge.descr: Fly fast through few gray, sad looking tracks.

challenge.name: #A0C000Narrow space
challenge.descr: Spaceships in flat, but narrow tracks.

challenge.name: #40D040Tight call
challenge.descr: Mom I don't want a spaceship, I want a car! This is a disaster waiting to happen. Spaceships in very narrow tracks. Fly extra careful and slow or you'll crash on each turn. V2 is recommended since it's the slowest one.

challenge.name: #6080B0Bridges aren't nice
challenge.descr: It was good to have that bridge wall holding your car. But now it's gone. Remember to keep on road, because the wall won't hold a hovering spaceship.

challenge.name: #60C0FFRound and bouncy
challenge.descr: Take the fast and very futuristic sphere around few tracks.

challenge.name: #20E0F0Oh, that's so odd
challenge.descr: Control the sphere through half pipes. Not easy. Weird.

challenge.name: Let's roll
challenge.descr: Collection of fast and fun tracks to roll through with the Sphere.

challenge.name: Gotta fly fast
challenge.descr: Fly with spaceship through winding roads.

challenge.name: #80C040Turtle Slow
challenge.descr: Few tracks driven with the slowest truck. Patience needed.

challenge.name: #40C040Slowest trip
challenge.descr: The slowest car drive on some easy tracks.

challenge.name: #A0B090Castle Delivery
challenge.descr: Take the truck up the castle. Remember to use lower gears when going up hill. Also slow down before circle turns and turn early and wide, use handbrake.

challenge.name: #C0C0A0Quick #90B0D0bus tour
challenge.descr: Fast bus drive on few scenic roads. Bus is very long, so avoid hitting its front, which isn't visible from default, behind camera.

challenge.name: #B0B0FFTeam #8080D0Exp#A04840edit#A0B0C0ion
challenge.descr: Challenging bus drive in outer space locations. Great for the team of explorers, trouble for the driver.

challenge.name: #A0C000Fast #90A0B0metal rolling
challenge.descr: Drive the fast 3 metal spheres vehicle through rather easy tracks. Caution on bridges, vehicle is very wide and will easily hit sides.

challenge.name: #8080D0Extreme #90A0B0metal rolling
challenge.descr: Drive the 3 metal spheres vehicle through extreme conditions.

challenge.name: #908030Monster wheels
challenge.descr: Challenging drive of the big and heavy monster truck on short tracks. Good high view of road but trouble with any bridge.

challenge.name: #F0F000Monster #E0E0C0city visit
challenge.descr: Challenging drive of the big and heavy monster truck on short tracks. Good high view of road but trouble with any bridge.

challenge.name: #B0F080Monster #B0FF00tight call
challenge.descr: Challenging drive of the big and heavy monster truck on narrow tracks. Good high view of road but trouble with any bridge.

challenge.name: #908030Monster #4090F0in space
challenge.descr: Challenging drive of the big and heavy monster truck on narrow tracks. Good high view of road but trouble with any bridge.

challenge.name: #B080F0Big wheeled narrow
challenge.descr: Extreme cars with biggest wheels in moderately narrow tracks.

challenge.name: #D0B0A0Big wheels and rocks
challenge.descr: Big wheeled, extreme cars in narrow tracks with lots of rocks near road. Be aware of car width and stay in middle. There is no room for errors.

challenge.name: #D0D8D8Get a grip, #F0A0A0fast
challenge.descr: The fastest super car on very slippery snowy roads in winter. Nonsense and without traction control pretty challenging. Release throttle whenever you notice spinning wheels to regain grip.

challenge.name: #D0D8D8Get a grip, #80E0E0slowly
challenge.descr: The fastest super car, on smallest icy tracks. Extreme nonsense and thus a challenge. Using boosters is even more practical to go forward rather than engine and wheels. And landing in snow near road may be a better way of braking.

challenge.name: #A0C080Nice motorbike trip
challenge.descr: Nice drive with regular motorbike on easy tracks.

challenge.name: #B0F080Long motorbike trip
challenge.descr: Nice drive with regular motorbike.

challenge.name: Motorbike stunts
challenge.descr: Stunts with motorbikes.
